select ci.id, ci.user_id, ci.order_code, ci.create_date, ci.staff_id, ci.content, ci.status, ui.name as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages,
si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, si.phone as staffPhone, si.code as staffCode from complaint_info ci left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ci.user_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.code = ci.order_code) left join merchant_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{complaintInfo.userName},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{complaintInfo.staffName},'%')
AND ci.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{complaintInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND si.id = #{complaintInfo.staffId}
order by ci.create_date desc

AND ui.id = #{userId}
order by ci.create_date desc
